TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the lamp is overcharged and explodes the lampshade along with itself.

I wish for moar liquid boosters.

Granted. The "Fire Ant" .625 m LFB is added to KSP. But it's actually worse than an ant engine under a few oscar-B tanks.

I wish that MLP would be abruptly cancelled.

Granted. It is replaced with My Little Pastor, a televangelism show that airs 24h a day on all channels.

I wish religion wasn't such a big deal to people.

Granted. Now, some people don't care about what they do because they no longer believe in judgement and the afterlife and some of them destroy everything they see, including you.

I wish I had more green bars.

Granted. Pop music becomes a far bigger deal than religion ever was, and the Biebersade devastates North America.

Edit: I should learn to refresh before my post. Granted. But you have no red or blue bars.

I wish my internet was cheap, reliable, and quick.

Granted. It is also severely filtered.

I wish for Internet businesses to ignore national boundaries.

Granted, by way of China conquering the world.

I wish for more genies.

Here you go:

"Genies"... that's short for guinea pigs. right...? o.O

I wish for a steak.

Granted. But it turns into a cow as soon as you touch it.

I wish that the ISS astronauts said hi to me while floating above my house.

Granted, but they get sucked out of the ISS as soon as they open the window to wave their hands to you. Happy? ._o

I wish for a cow.

Granted. Well by said I mean wrote on the side of the munition on the secret weapon system they're helping test. It's a direct hit!

I wish people understood that orbits are stable.

Granted. They refuse to fund station-keeping thrusters on all subsequent real life satellites.

I wish KSP physics applied to real life.

It does! Just throw a brick and watch it glide through the sky, Don't believe me? Throw one toward you neighbors window and it will fly up away from it into the sky!

I wish I had more rep.

Granted. But it's bad rep, you now have bad reputation among some un-heard-of community O.O

u need to be more specific.

I wish internet point bars were all the same color!

Granted. Everything is black. Text, pictures, backgrounds, mouse cursor, all black.

I wish for more magic lamps.

Granted. All of them contain red genies, which grant half-wishes. You are so dissatisfied that you leave.

I wish that screens, especially phone screens, stopped working.
Darn it, my screen broke and I can't see what your wish was. I wish my screen was fixed.

Granted. The phone engineer builds a gun into your screen, and you get sent to prison for it.

I wish for the ability to make half-wishes.

Granted. I hope you have the facilities to care for a female whale, otherwise known as a cow.

I wish spring comes soon.

Granted. It sends a ball bearing flying into your eye.

I wish Christmas would go away. Bah, humbug!

Granted, but your great grandma doesn't get that gift of money so she can't afford the life saving surgery, so you aren't born.

I wish for my wish to be granted.

Granted. Everyone hates you now.

I wish for the Copernicus MTV to have been built and flown TO MARS AND THAT IT SUCCESSFULLY carries out its missions.

Granted, you don't live to see it happen.

I wish to have a better wish and be better at making wishes.

Granted. You now have a better corrupted wish and are better and making dreams corrupted.

I wish for the power to corrupt dreams.

Granted. You trigger nightmares in the waking at forty paces, whether you want to or not.

I wish for a good Christmas Number 1 that's nothing to do with the X Factor.
